attributes.action: Revert the stamp duty threshold for first time buyers to £500,000 indefinitely.
attributes.additional_details:
Due to the rising cost of properties, it is almost impossible for young families to be able buy a house in London and surrounding areas. 
The government should do more by reverting the stamp duty for first time buyers to £500,000 indefinitely.
attributes.background: Revert the stamp duty threshold for first time buyers to £500,000 indefinitely.
